message.content:
cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.LG 

This paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category as it deals with recommendation engines and their impact on e-commerce platforms. Additionally, the paper introduces new metrics to evaluate the effectiveness of personalized recommendations, which is a common topic in the field of information retrieval. 

The Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) sub-category is also likely as the paper focuses on customer behavior on e-commerce websites and the impact of personalized recommendations on their interactions. 

The Cybersecurity (cs.CY) sub-category is a possibility as the paper may touch on issues related to data privacy and security in the context of personalized recommendations. 

The Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category is another possibility as the paper may explore the social network aspect of e-commerce platforms and how personalized recommendations can influence customer interactions. 

Finally, the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category is a possibility as the paper may use machine learning techniques to develop and evaluate the new metrics introduced in the paper.
